content.raw:
Updated to work around comms client issue \(potential race condition?\).  I discovered that I couldn't `SendTo` from within the scope of a callback.  To work around this, I created another worker thread to manage the sending of the message.

  
Note that this changes the test procedure, starting the scoring is now done from within the test, so should not be done at the command line.
content.html:
Updated to work around comms client issue (potential race condition?). I discovered that I couldn't SendTo from within the scope of a callback. To work around this, I created another worker thread to manage the sending of the message.

Note that this changes the test procedure, starting the scoring is now done from within the test, so should not be done at the command line.
